translation: The righteous who eat the remnants of the sacrifice are freed from all sins; but those sinful ones who cook food solely for their own sake indeed consume sin.
commentary: 3.13 Yajnashishtashinah who eat the remnants of the sacrifice? Saints the righteous? Muchyanthe are freed? sarvakilbisaih from all sins? eat eat? And those? You indeed? Agham sin? Sinful ones? These who? cook cook? Atmakaranat for their own sake.Commentary Those who? after performing the five great sacrifices? eating the remnants of the food are freed from all the sins committed by these five agents of
